    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)

      • serialize

        private void serialize()
        Saves the user's account including all their plans to their name + "planner.ser". That file is deserialized every time the program is run, allowing the user to save progress. This method is called every time the program is closed.

      • deserialize

        private MealPlanner deserialize​(java.lang.String name)
        Takes user input to deserialize a previous account, if no account matches the provided name it creates a new one
        Returns:
        the previously saved account or a new one if none are found.

      • MainMenu

        Displays the GUI for the main menu.

        Parameters:

        thisDay - the day that is being edited
